title: wine_Castillo_del_Barón_2004_Crianza_Red_(Yecla)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 72589.
country: Spain.
description: At first glance it may seem a little saucy, but as it gains its legs this aged Yecla wine shows solid plum, berry and cassis aromas and flavors along with a lively, healthy palate. It's incredibly smooth in the mouth, and definitely ready to go. Spice and chocolate are the finishing touches to what amounts to a nice, warm-climate Mourvèdre. A Europvin, Christopher Cannan selection, Imported by multiple importers, including Michael Skurnik Wines..
designation: Crianza.
points: 89.

province: Levante.
